statements: SELECT * FROM network_coverage_areas
SELECT area_name, coverage_type FROM network_coverage_areas WHERE signal_strength > 0
SELECT * FROM network_coverage_areas WHERE coverage_type = '4G' ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM network_coverage_areas WHERE signal_strength > 50 ORDER BY signal_strength DESC
SELECT area_id, area_name, signal_strength FROM network_coverage_areas WHERE coverage_type = '3G'
SELECT * FROM network_coverage_areas WHERE coverage_type = '4G' ORDER BY area_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT area_name, signal_strength FROM network_coverage_areas WHERE signal_strength > 80 AND coverage_type = '5G' ORDER BY signal_strength ASC
SELECT area_id, area_name, coverage_type FROM network_coverage_areas WHERE coverage_type = '3G' OR coverage_type = '5G' ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT area_id, coverage_type FROM network_coverage_areas WHERE area_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY area_id ASC
SELECT * FROM network_coverage_areas WHERE coverage_type IN ('2G', '3G') ORDER BY signal_strength DESC, area_id ASC
SELECT area_name, signal_strength FROM coverage_areas;
SELECT * FROM coverage_areas ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM coverage_areas WHERE signal_strength > 50;
SELECT * FROM signal_samples WHERE sample_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM signal_samples ORDER BY sample_date ASC, signal_strength DESC;
SELECT * FROM coverage_areas WHERE signal_strength > 50 ORDER BY area_id DESC
SELECT area_name, signal_strength FROM coverage_areas WHERE area_id = 3
SELECT MAX(signal_strength) AS max_strength FROM signal_samples
SELECT * FROM coverage_areas WHERE signal_strength BETWEEN 30 AND 60 ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT area_name, COUNT(area_id) AS area_count FROM coverage_areas GROUP BY area_name HAVING area_count > 1
SELECT * FROM network_coverage_areas;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM network_coverage_areas WHERE signal_strength > 50;
SELECT area_name, signal_strength FROM network_coverage_areas ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT data_id, area_id, signal_reading, data_timestamp FROM signal_strength_data WHERE data_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT result_id, result_value, analysis_date FROM signal_analysis_results WHERE result_value < 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_date;
SELECT area_id, area_name, signal_strength FROM network_coverage_areas;
SELECT result_id, data_id, result_value, analysis_date FROM signal_analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, signal_reading FROM network_coverage_areas JOIN signal_strength_data ON network_coverage_areas.area_id = signal_strength_data.area_id;
SELECT * FROM signal_strength_data WHERE signal_reading > 80 ORDER BY data_timestamp ASC;
SELECT area_name, AVG(signal_strength) AS avg_signal_strength FROM network_coverage_areas GROUP BY area_name HAVING avg_signal_strength > 50;
SELECT * FROM network_coverage_areas;
SELECT area_name, signal_strength FROM network_coverage_areas WHERE signal_strength > 70;
SELECT provider_name FROM network_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT tower_name, area_id FROM signal_towers WHERE tower_id = 3;
SELECT reading_id, reading_time FROM signal_readings WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM signal_towers WHERE tower_name LIKE 'Tower%' ORDER BY tower_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) AS total_towers FROM network_providers JOIN signal_towers ON network_providers.provider_id = signal_towers.area_id GROUP BY provider_name ORDER BY total_towers DESC;

SELECT area_name, AVG(signal_strength) AS avg_signal_strength FROM network_coverage_areas JOIN signal_towers ON network_coverage_areas.area_id = signal_towers.area_id GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY avg_signal_strength DESC;

SELECT tower_name, MAX(signal_strength) AS max_signal_strength FROM signal_towers JOIN signal_readings ON signal_towers.tower_id = signal_readings.tower_id GROUP BY tower_name ORDER BY max_signal_strength DESC;

SELECT provider_name, reading_time FROM network_providers JOIN signal_towers ON network_providers.provider_id = signal_towers.area_id JOIN signal_readings ON signal_towers.tower_id = signal_readings.tower_id WHERE provider_name = 'ProviderX' ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM signal_towers WHERE tower_location = 'New York'
SELECT tower_id, tower_location FROM signal_towers WHERE signal_strength > 70.5
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM network_providers WHERE provider_type = '5G'
SELECT area_name, signal_strength FROM coverage_areas WHERE coverage_type = 'outdoor'
SELECT tower_height, signal_strength FROM signal_towers ORDER BY tower_height DESC
SELECT area_id, area_name, coverage_type FROM coverage_areas;
SELECT tower_id, tower_location, tower_height, signal_strength, area_id FROM signal_towers WHERE signal_strength > 80;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_type FROM network_providers WHERE provider_type = '5G';
SELECT tower_id, provider_id, available FROM tower_availability WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT measurement_id, timestamp, signal_strength FROM signal_measurements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
